movies.title: La nuit de la mort!
movies.plot: Young Martine begins working as a nurse at Deadlock House, a secluded grande retirement home, but from the beginning not everything is as it seems, strange residents each with their own quirks and a rather macabre dietary supplement to their vegetarian diet are ruled by the strict Miss Helene, and her suspicions are soon raised when her co-worker who has taken her leave for two months leaves without her suitcase.
movies.simplePlot: Young Martine begins working as a nurse at Deadlock House, a secluded grande retirement home, but from the beginning not everything is as it seems, strange residents each with their own ...

biography.bio: Isabelle Goguey is an assistant director and actress, known for La nuit de la mort! (1980), À nous les balous (1987) and La Fille à la fourrure (1977).
biography.name: Isabelle Goguey

biography.bio: Charlotte de Turckheim was born on April 5, 1955 in Paris, France as Anne-Charlotte de Turckheim. She is an actress and writer, known for Times Have Been Better (2006), Un Amour à taire (2005) and Les aristos (2006). She has been married to Zaman Hashemi since August 31, 2012. She was previously married to Jean-Marc Piaton and Jean-Noël Fenwick.
biography.name: Charlotte de Turckheim

biography.bio: Michel Flavius is an actor, known for La nuit de la mort! (1980).
biography.name: Michel Flavius

biography.bio: Betty Beckers was born on May 3, 1925 in Villeneuve-Saint-Georges, France. She was an actress, known for The Things of Life (1970), César and Rosalie (1972) and Vincent, François, Paul and the Others (1974). She died on December 21, 1982 in Neuilly-sur-Seine, France.
biography.name: Betty Beckers

biography.bio: Jean Ludow is an actor, known for La nuit de la mort! (1980) and The Two Seasons of Life (1975).
biography.name: Jean Ludow

biography.bio: Jeannette Batti was born on September 6, 1921 in Marseille, Bouches-du-Rhône, France as Henriette Eugénie Genot. She was an actress, known for Four Bags Full (1956), Une nuit à Megève (1953) and Paris est toujours Paris (1951). She was married to Henri Génès. She died on February 10, 2011 in Courbevoie, Hauts-de-Seine, France.
biography.name: Jeannette Batti

biography.bio: Michel Debrane is an actor, known for Diva (1981), Je m'appelle (2002) and Celestial Clockwork (1995).
biography.name: Michel Debrane

biography.bio: Germaine Delbat was born on March 16, 1904 in Courbevoie, Seine [now Hauts-de-Seine], France as Germaine Marie Fuster. She was an actress, known for Les Fargeot (1974), Oscar (1967) and Four Bags Full (1956). She died on April 24, 1988 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Germaine Delbat

biography.bio: Georges Lucas was born on March 3, 1927 in Bogota, Colombia. He is an actor, known for Le miraculé (1987), Litan (1982) and La revanche des mortes vivantes (1987).
biography.name: Georges Lucas

biography.bio: Denise Montréal is an actress, known for La nuit de la mort! (1980), The Case of Dr. Laurent (1957) and Plaisir du théâtre (1956).
biography.name: Denise Montréal

biography.bio: Ernest Menzer is an actor, known for Band of Outsiders (1964), Bed & Board (1970) and La nuit de la mort! (1980).
biography.name: Ernest Menzer

biography.bio: Pierre Helliet is an actor, known for La nuit de la mort! (1980).
biography.name: Pierre Helliet

biography.bio: Michel Duchezeau is an actor, known for My New Partner (1984), Larguez les amarres! (1976) and Le village en folie (1982).
biography.name: Michel Duchezeau

biography.bio: Jean-Paul Lilienfeld was born on July 17, 1962 in Paris, France. He is an actor and writer, known for La journée de la jupe (2008), Quatre garçons pleins d'avenir (1997) and Arrêtez-moi (2013).
biography.name: Jean-Paul Lilienfeld

biography.bio: Richard Joffo is an actor and writer, known for La nuit de la mort! (1980) and The Eurovision Song Contest (1980).
biography.name: Richard Joffo
